Class Anchor

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.creature.Anchor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parent

    public class Anchor
extends Object
implements Parent
    A class of anchors involving a name and item
    Author:
    Mathias, Frederic

      • canAddItem

        public boolean canAddItem(Item item)
        Check whether the given item can be added to this anchor.
        Specified by:
        canAddItem in interface Parent
        Returns:
        False if the given item is ineffective. | if( item == null) then | result == false False if the item this anchor contains is effective. | if (getItem() != null) then | result == false Otherwise false if the given item is an instance of item implementation and has a parent. | if( item instanceof ItemImplementation && ((ItemImplementation)item).hasParent() ) then | result == false Otherwise the result is equal to whether or not the item can be added to the holder of this anchor. | result == getHolder().canAddItem(item)
